masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "Multiple floats have lost control! The Frosty float crashed into a lamppost, the giant Santa balloon broke free and is heading for that skyscraper, and the marching band is trapped between two runaway Nutcracker floats! This is supposed to be FESTIVE!"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Stop the runaway floats before they hurt someone
  • Retrieve the Santa balloon before it tangles in the skyscraper
  • Rescue the marching band from between the Nutcrackers
